sections.section_instructions:
Reading Passage 2 has six sections, A-G.

Which paragraph contains the following information?

Write the correct letter A-G in boxes 15-21 on your answer sheet.

NB You may use any letter more than once.

questions.question_text: It is awarded on results obtained in the SCE exam.
It is only available to students from the College's overseas branch.
It is not offered every year.
Students need to apply for it.
It is offered twice each year.
It pays 100% of the student's tuition fees.
It provides 50% of one year's fees.

sections.section_instructions:
Choose the correct letter A, B, C or D.

Write the correct letter in boxes 22-27 on your answer sheet.

questions.question_text: To use the library printers, students must have.
To copy search results to a floppy disk, students pay.

options.C: A fee based on actual costs
options.D: A fee dependent on the time taken

questions.question_text: If library staff search for information on CD-ROM, students pay.

options.C: A fee based on actual costs
options.D: A fee dependent on the time taken

questions.question_text: Students can learn to use the Internet.

options.B: In the first two weeks of term only

questions.question_text: To ensure efficient access to the library workstations, students should.

options.A: Queue to use a workstation in the Media Services Area
options.B: Reserve a time to use a workstation
options.C: Work in groups on one workstation
options.D: Conduct as many searches as possible at one time

questions.question_text: At any one time, students may use a library workstation for.
